rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 8 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:43 PM, 08 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Rizal, Quezon and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Metro Manila(Quezon City, Caloocan, Valenzuela, Malabon, Navotas), Bulacan(Obando, Meycauayan, Marilao, San Jose del Monte, Santa Maria, Norzagaray, Dona Remedios Trinidad, Bocaue, Bulakan), Nueva Ecija(General Tinio, Gapan, Cabanatuan, Santa Rosa, San Leonardo, Penaranda, Palayan, Jaen, Licab), Tarlac(San Jose, Victoria, Tarlac City, Gerona, Pura), Bataan(Morong, Bagac), Cavite(Maragondon, Ternate, Naic, Tanza, Indang), Batangas(Nasugbu, Lian) and Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, San Marcelino, Castillejos, San Narciso, San Felipe, San Antonio, Subic, Olongapo) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
